message: Hello Bob, I am offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it is a fair price considering its value and potential.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you think the product is worth more than $11,000, but I still think $12,000 is a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
